Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People have been buzzing about Australia's federal budget with some top economists warning of inflation and prolonged mortgage rate pain. The government has announced a higher Heavy Vehicle Road User Charge to fund road upgrades which has received backlash from the transport industry. The sale of Sydney's untouched coastline for a whopping $50 million continues to highlight the growth and stability of the Australian economy. While Stockland experienced a 0.9% increase the chances of a rate cut being pushed out till 2024 is causing concern amongst mortgage holders.
